'''Simulanka''' was a limited time summer event area featured in [[Version 4.8]] during the [[Summertide Scales and Tales]] event. The world of Simulanka was created by [[Alice]], [[Barbeloth]], and [[Andersdotter]], three members of the [[Hexenzirkel]]; they are known by Simulanka's people as the Goddesses of Creation, Prophecy, and Fate respectively.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Until the End of the World}}</ref> Alice brought the [[Traveler]], [[Paimon]], [[Nilou]], [[Kirara]], [[Navia]], and [[Wanderer]] to Simulanka to experience its story.

==Trivia==
*[[Vision]]s don't work in Simulanka.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|The Story Begins in a Forest Without Rain}}</ref>
===Etymology===
*''Simulanka'' may be derived from "simulation" and {{Lang|{{w|Lanka}}|sa=लङ्का|sa_rm=laṅkā}}, the island city of the legendary king {{w|Ravana}} in the Hindu epic of {{w|Ramayana}}.
